"Kill off the nuisances!":
"Oh dear oh dear! Something big has
happened! I was thinking of working together
with the people of the ARKS to construct the
location of the festival, and the large D-Arkers
have appeared in the vicinity! It would be
scary to continue with the construction
of the location, and I was wondering if you could
kill off these nuisances!

*Target Dekor Maryuda of Lv.1 or higher"

"大変大変！　大事件だよっ！
アークスのみんなと協力して会場づくりを
しようと思ったら、大型のダーカーが
会場近くに現れちゃったんだって！
このまま会場づくりを続けるのも怖いから
そいつをやっつけてくれないかなっ！

※Lv.1～のデコル・マリューダが対象"
